text: (Musa) jwatite: “Chisimu Jwalakwe akuwecheta yanti chisimu jalakwejo ni ng'ombe jangajijiganya masengo gaguguda litaka, soni jangajitila mbeju, jambonembonepe mwanti jangali liwala.” Wanganyao watite: “Sambano nim'biche nago malowe gakuona-onape.” Basi niwajisikite (mwalikanganichisya), mwanti wasigele panandi kuti akatenda
